items.typeLine: Physician's Quartz Flask of the Mockingbird
explicitMods: 16% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
45% reduced Effect of Curses on you during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Southbound
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: Adds 67 to 95 Cold Damage to Attacks
14% increased maximum Life
+46% to Cold Resistance
100% increased Freeze Duration on Enemies
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: This Gem gains 60% increased Experience
+24% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts a buff that grants different bonuses to melee skills depending on your stance. Using the skill again alternates between Blood Stance and Sand Stance.
explicitMods: Melee Skills deal 15% more Area Damage while in Blood Stance
Melee Skills have 5% less Area of Effect while in Blood Stance
Melee Skills have 15% more Area of Effect while in Sand Stance
Melee Skills deal 5% less Area Damage while in Sand Stance
50% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
20% increased Projectile Attack Damage while in Blood Stance
20% increased Projectile Speed while in Sand Stance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Marylene's Fallacy

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood

items.name: Dying Sun

items.name: Eber's Unification
explicitMods: Trigger Level 10 Void Gaze when you use a Skill

The air we breathe knows no such boundaries.
I exhale, and you inhale,
and inexorably we inch towards oneness.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both a channelling skill and a non-channelling spell skill to work. The channelling skill will trigger a spell periodically while channelling. socketedItems.secDescrText: Place a Frost Shield that drains your energy shield for one second or until you run out, gaining stages while this drain occurs. The Frost Shield takes some damage from hits in place of you and allies while in its area. Enemies in the area are Chilled. You can only have one Frost Shield active at once.
explicitMods: Base duration is 10.00 seconds
20% increased Effect of Cold Ailments
20% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies in Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
60% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies outside Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
You gain +0.38% to Spell Critical Strike Chance per Stage while in Area
Frost Shield has 910 maximum Life per Stage
Maximum 4 Stages
Gains 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while you are losing Energy Shield
You lose 730 Energy Shield per second

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).

Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
38% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 15% increased Fire Damage
